CustomField.description: Specify the API Name by running the query: SELECT Id,Name,UrlPathPrefix FROM Site to link field configuration to a specific site, or set to "ALL" to display across sites where this component is used.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specify the API Name by running the query: SELECT Id,Name,UrlPathPrefix FROM Site to link field configuration to a specific site, or set to "ALL" to display across sites where this component is used.
CustomField.label: Portal API Name
